text: Rules of Engagement is an American sitcom set in New York City. It aired from February 5, 2007 to May 20, 2013 on CBS. It has five main characters. Patrick Warburton and Megyn Price play married couple Jeff and Audrey. Oliver Hudson and Bianca Kajlich play engaged couple Adam and Jen. David Spade plays womanizing narcissistic single man Russell. Adhir Kalyan plays Timmy, Russell's office assistant. == Other websites == * Category:2007 American television series debuts Category:2013 American television series endings Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2000s romance television series Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s romance television series Category:CBS network shows Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:Romantic comedy television series Category:Television series about marriage Category:Television series set in New York City Category:English-language television programs
title: Rules of Engagement (TV series)
